response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its true worth and the impact it can have on your business or lifestyle, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects its high quality and the exclusivity it brings. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how it could be a valuable addition to your world.", "product_price": 9500}
